backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining rooms, messages, user profiles, moderation actions, and access‑controlled methods for creating rooms, sending messages, and managing mutes/blocks/reports.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three room‑search and messaging‑copy updates to affected frontend files and components with high confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their responsibilities across routing, hooks, components, UI, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens and global background/text setup.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React app via main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping pages with AppShell, ThemeProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageActi: UI menu for message actions including mute, block, and report, with a dialog for submitting report reasons and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Chat input component handling authentication, profile readiness, message sending, validation, and error states with login redirects.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders a scrollable message list with auto-scrolling, moderation filtering, sender avatars, timestamps, and message actions for non-own messages.
Provides the main layout with header, content area, and bottom navigation, showing current area selection and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/data/indiaStateCentroids.ts: Exports approximate latitude/longitude centroids for Indian states and union territories for in‑memory closest‑state calculations.
frontend/src/data/indiaStates.ts: Defines stable IDs and display labels for all Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonProfile.ts: Loads or generates an anonymous user profile and provides an updater that persists changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAreaSelection.ts: Manages area selection with persistence and optional geolocation to auto-select the closest Indian state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthControls.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth with helpers for safe login, logout, and derived authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity login, stored identity restoration, and auth state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Handles local muted/blocked user lists, persists them, and filters messages accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching rooms, messages, and performing mutations like creating rooms, sending messages, and user moderation actions using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages user profile state, loading and saving backend profiles when authenticated or using a local anonymous profile otherwise, with auto-creation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus a subtle background image and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays a chat room with message polling, a message list, and a composer, including a header and room navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login UI with Internet Identity-based authentication and redirects after successful login.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Shows rooms filtered by area and search, supports room creation with authentication checks, and handles joining rooms.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React settings page handling area selection, location toggle, profile updates, and login/logout logic with various UI components and hooks.
Generates, loads, and saves anonymous user profiles with random IDs, nicknames, colors, and avatars in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/areaSelectionStorag: Stores and retrieves area selection state, including a special 'All areas' option and available Indian states.
frontend/src/utils/auth/isAuthError.ts: Checks whether an error message matches common authentication or authorization failure patterns.
frontend/src/utils/auth/postLoginRedirec: Manages storing and retrieving a redirect path in sessionStorage for after successful login.
frontend/src/utils/location/closestIndia: Uses Haversine distance to find the closest Indian state centroid to given coordinates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata including features, requests, and configuration for the Rooms search restrictions project.
